sentences.sContent: The dollar has fallen in value amid rumors of weakness in the US economy.
sentences.sCn: 在一片美国经济疲软的传言中，美元贬值了。

sentences.sContent: Demonstrators ripped up the national flag amid shouts of ‘Death to the tyrants!’
sentences.sCn: 示威者在“处死暴君！”的叫喊声中将国旗撕得粉碎。

trans.tranOther: while noisy, busy, or confused events are happening – used in writing or news reports
